## dialog.confirm() function

Wrapper to window.confirm() that app developers may override via setConfirm to provide alternatives to the modal browser window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function confirm(message: string, callback: (p1: boolean) => AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | The message to display to the user. |
|  callback | (p1: boolean) =&gt; AnyDuringMigration | The callback for handling user response. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
